entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
